Articles.Content:
Welp, after nearly a year of reading these forums anonamously, i finally decided to use my account that i amde and forgot a while back. So, hey i guess, hopefully i'll use this alot more now, mostly for challenges i expect.

Spoiler

 

also, a newby question to get this started, how on earth do i get rid of that spoiler i accidentally just plopped in the middle of my post? (Stupid curious brain as usual, 'ooh what's that eyeball for?')

Thanks and hey.
Welcome! To delete the spoiler you control-right click it and click 'Remove Spoiler'.
Welcome to the forums of kerbal communications! Hope you have a wonderful time!

Well it's about time you went from lurker to poster!

Welcome!
